AI Description: treetime is a flexible and efficient tool for dating phylogenetic trees. It uses a maximum-likelihood-based approach to infer ancestral dates and divergence times, allowing for the incorporation of temporal information into phylogenetic analyses.
Core Features: Phylogenetic Tree Dating, Maximum-Likelihood Method, Ancestral Date & Divergence Time Inference, Incorporation Of Temporal Information, Flexible & Efficient
General Tags: Phylogenetics, Evolutionary Biology, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Phylogenetic Analysis
